AnalysisStep.description: Represents a single step in the analysis process
AnalysisStep.title: AnalysisStep

format.description: Represents the grading result for transcription analysis

reasoning_steps.description: Step by step reasoning process with detailed explanations
reasoning_steps.title: Reasoning Steps

overall_accuracy.description: How well the transcription matches the audio content
overall_accuracy.title: Overall Accuracy

joint_smoothness.description: How seamless the transition is between chunks
joint_smoothness.title: Joint Smoothness

contextual_continuity.description: Whether meaning flows naturally across chunk boundaries
contextual_continuity.title: Contextual Continuity

grammar_integrity.description: Whether sentences are properly maintained across chunk boundaries
grammar_integrity.title: Grammar Integrity

word_completeness.description: Whether words are split or incomplete at the joints
word_completeness.title: Word Completeness

redundancy.description: Whether there is unnecessary repetition at the joints
redundancy.title: Redundancy

content_loss.description: Whether any content is missing at the joints
content_loss.title: Content Loss

joint_readability.description: How readable the text is at the joint points
joint_readability.title: Joint Readability

format.title: GradingResult
